creator: andre.wendel@bmw.de
text:
Hello,

i tried to tunnel an websocket SSL connection to a GFv4 backend which runs on SSL, but i wan't able to establish an connection.

As long as I configured the ProxyPass rules with the protocol WS on the HTTP port of the Glassfish everything worked as expected. After changing the configuration to WSS and the HTTPS port, the connection breaks.

During the debug with whireshark, is seems that even if the proxypass rules run on WSS the Apache talks NON SSL to the backend, because all requests are readable by whireshark?

After changing the configuration to WSS ProxyPass on NON SSL the communication worked.

Best regards,
André
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 55320 ***
creator: ylavic.dev@gmail.com
